connect20/mageworkshop_dpi.name: connect20/MageWorkshop_DPI

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/mageworkshop_dpi.description: This extension displays attribute values of the product on Product Page and various product lists (Category Page, Tagged Products, Search and Advanced search).
